image.caption: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives

profileText: A Representative from New York; born in Staten Island, Richmond County, N.Y., September 12, 1957; graduated from Monsignor Farrell High School, Staten Island, N.Y.; B.A., New York University, New York, N.Y., 1980; A.A. Heidelberg U., Heidelberg, Germany, 1983; J.D. New York University Law School, New York, N.Y., 1985; lawyer, private practice; member, New York city council, 2002-2008; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Eleventh Congress (January 3, 2009-January 3, 2011); unsuccessful candidate for reelection to the One Hundred Twelfth Congress in 2010; Staten Island, Richmond County, N.Y. district attorney, 2015-present.
